about_the_game:
ANNIHILATION APPROACHES

Shattered Sun is a twin-stick action roguelike where time is the ultimate enemy. Pilot a powerful experimental mech and fight your way across the solar system's planets, crushing enemies in your path as you try to escape the unstable sun before it's too late. Do you have what it takes, Commander?


CUSTOMISE YOUR MECH

Find and equip a vast array of weaponry and armour to experiment with various playstyles and find your preferred way of delivering destruction. Bring the pain with dual miniguns, or get more personal with flamethrowers. Gracefully weave between enemy attacks with streamlined armour, or become an unstoppable combat force with heavy armour. Discover Cells that modify your weapons in unique ways.


FIGHT AND EXPLORE

Make tactical decisions and plan your route of carnage through the planetary map. Different enemy factions and biomes present unique challenges you must be ready to face, requiring vastly different strategies and equipment to effectively destroy.


THE ROGUELIKES YOU LOVE

With randomly generated planets, a tactical planetary map, and random item drops, no two runs will feel the same. Find new ways to play and constantly hone your skills to endure any challenge the game throws at you.

DISCLAIMER

Shattered Sun is currently in Alpha. Expect more weapons, armours, abilities, enemies, biomes, cells, and an improved gameplay experience in the near future. Join our public Discord server for feedback, FAQs, and information about future content and updates.

name: Shattered Sun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 (21H1, build 19043 or newer) or 11 64-bit
  • Processor: X64 with SEE2 instruction set support or ARM64. Intel Core i5-4500 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (or equivalent).
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 (21H1, build 19043 or newer) or 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8300 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with 4GB+ of VRAM. GTX 1050 or Radeon RX550 (or equivalent).
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Shattered Sun is a fast-paced roguelike where you pilot a powerful mech to escape a doomed star system by battling through hostile planets, upgrading your gear, and racing against time before the sun explodes.
